meanings.definition: A unit of measurement equal to one sixth of a whole.
meanings.sent1: The recipe called for two sextos of sugar.
meanings.sent2: The ruler was divided into sextos for precise measurements.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally added six sextos of salt instead of sugar to the cake batter!
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was like a perfect sextos of a whole heart.
meanings.sent5: The sextos of the puzzle piece fit perfectly into place.

meanings.definition: A type of musical composition consisting of six voices or parts.
meanings.sent1: The choir performed a beautiful piece with intricate sextos.
meanings.sent2: The symphony included a challenging section with sextos for each instrument.
meanings.sent3: The sextos of the song harmonized in a magical way.
meanings.sent4: The sextos of the orchestra created a symphony of sound.
meanings.sent5: The sextos of the melody intertwined to create a masterpiece.

meanings.definition: A type of poetry consisting of six lines.
meanings.sent1: She wrote a heartfelt poem with six sextos that touched everyone.
meanings.sent2: The poet's collection included various sextos exploring nature and love.
meanings.sent3: The sextos of the poem danced on the page like graceful ballerinas.
meanings.sent4: Each sextos of the verse painted a vivid picture in the reader's mind.
meanings.sent5: The sextos of the stanza flowed seamlessly from one to the next.
